content: show off the gradient to it s full advantage any yarn - about fingering weight - that has a slow progress through several colors will work great with this stole as stated the pattern will make a rectangle of about 50 cm / 20 in x 160 cm / 64 in different yarns will produce slightly different sizes - by adding or reducing stitches the finished length will vary i had one 300 g skein of the yarn and i used all but a few grams the pattern will tell you how to make the most of the available yardage a knit-on icord gives a polished edge to the short side of the stole
